text: We're at Iguazu Falls here in Brazil

This is the coolest thing
I'm on the boardwalk at sunset

look at the view
I am surrounded by waterfalls

So when you come to Iguazu
National Park make sure you stay at the

Because it is the only hotel that's situated
inside Iguazu National Park

You have exclusive access to go see the falls
before the crowds get here at sunrise

or after the crowds leave at sunset
And really, the experience is magical!
